name: Cradlesong (fixed)
description:
Cradlesong is a rhythm stealth horror game created for the MegaJam2020 by the team Resort to Violins.

It is estimated to be around a 10-minute experience.

Controls

This game is played with mouse & keyboard only. WASD - Movement Left Mouse Button - Play or Stop playing the violin Mouse movement left/right - Move the violin bow to match the golden thread coming towards you.

Credits:

Gunnlaugur Arnarson - 3D Artist & Level Designer

Isak Mansén - 3D Artist

Tobias Westlund - Programmer

Jesper Backman - Programmer

Alexander Axelsson - Music  & Sound Designer | https://soundcloud.com/user-341331197
